definition: to play/to have fun/to trifle with/toy/sth used for amusement/curio or antique (Taiwan pr. [wan4])/to keep sth for entertainment
a refined and elegant object for enjoyment/curio
scholar's rock (one of the naturally-eroded, fantastically-shaped rocks put on display indoors or in gardens in China)
to appreciate/to take pleasure in/to enjoy
a type of clay found in the region of Yixing 宜興|宜兴[Yi2 xing1], used to make Yixing stoneware, with its distinctive russet or dark purple coloring
water pot or goblet (for Chinese calligraphy)
refined activities of the intellectuals (regarding literature, paintings etc)
recreative seal, bearing not the owner's name but a well-known verse or such, and used for artistic purposes on paintings etc
(literary) things other than the bare necessities of life/item of some value/Taiwan pr. [zhang4 wu4]
the strokes of a character/calligraphy and painting
